title: Gogglebox viewers can’t get over Pete’s hysterical reactions to A Quiet Place
text:
You okay, Pete? (Picture: Channel 4)

Gogglebox put their cast of sofa dwellers through another horror film in A Quiet Place, spawning some hysterical reactions from Pete.

The 2018 horror flick became one of the year’s breakout hits, starring John Krasinski and Emily Blunt in a world overrun by blind monsters with an incredible sense of hearing.

After it aired on mainstream television this week, it was left to the cast of Gogglebox to endure the film’s hazardous jump scares and frights.

A highlight of the whole segment was sibling duo Pete and Sophie’s response, with the former screaming profanities while launching off the sofa.

Watching people freak on a Friday? There’s no entertainment better.

Pete and Sophie’s reactions to this horror film on #GoggleBox are too funny 😂😂😂😂😂 — makala bradley (@kalab91) October 11, 2019

Advertisement

Advertisement

Incredible.

Good news for Pete, a sequel for A Quiet Place is currently in development with filming on the project kicking off in July this year.

Plot details on the sequel are unknown, but Krasinski will return as director, with Emily Blunt, Millicent Simmonds, and Noah Jupe reprising their roles.

Peaky Blinders star Cillian Murphy was also announced as a new addition to the cast.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Gogglebox airs on Channel 4 Fridays at 9pm.

MORE: Gogglebox’s Giles Wood makes bizarre ‘milf’ dig at The Circle’s Katie and fans are in stitches
description: Gogglebox viewers were in bits over the reactions to A Quiet Place.
